info.name: Generic Data Importer API
info.description:
AI-powered data extraction service that intelligently maps source data to user-defined schemas using LLM-based field extraction.

## Getting Started
1. Import this collection and the environment file
2. Start the backend server: `npm run start:dev`
3. Use the Health endpoints to verify connectivity
4. Upload test data files using the Extract endpoint

## Workflow
1. POST /extract - Upload file + context → Get operationId
2. GET /operations/{operationId} - Poll for status/results
3. POST /operations/{operationId}/cancel - Cancel if needed

request.description: Basic health check at root endpoint

item.name: Extract
item.description: Data extraction endpoints - the core functionality

request.description:
Upload a sales CSV file and extract structured data.

**Test Data:** Use `test-data/sales_data.csv`

**Response:** Returns operationId which is automatically saved to environment.

Upload an employee CSV file and extract HR data.

**Test Data:** Use `test-data/employee_data.csv`

Upload an inventory CSV file and extract product data.

**Test Data:** Use `test-data/inventory_data.csv`

Test compound field extraction - addresses combined in single column need to be parsed into separate fields.

**Test Data:** Use `test-data/customer_addresses.csv`

formdata.description: Name of the sheet to process

request.description:
Example of extracting from a specific sheet in an Excel file.

Modify the sheetName parameter as needed.

Get the status of an extraction operation.

Uses the `operationId` from environment (auto-saved from Extract requests).

**Statuses:**
- `pending` - Queued for processing
- `processing` - Currently extracting
- `completed` - Done, result available
- `failed` - Error occurred
- `cancelled` - User cancelled

Get operation status with a manually specified ID.

Replace `op_your_operation_id_here` with your actual operation ID.

Cancel a pending or processing operation.

Cannot cancel completed or failed operations.

item.name: Bedrock (AI Models)
item.description: Direct AWS Bedrock model interaction - reference endpoints

request.description: Get list of available AWS Bedrock models

Invoke an AI model with a prompt.

**Models:**
- `anthropic.claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022-v2:0` - High quality
- `anthropic.claude-3-5-haiku-20241022-v1:0` - Fast & cheap
- `us.amazon.nova-lite-v1:0` - Amazon's model

Stream AI model response via Server-Sent Events.

**Note:** Streaming responses work best in a browser or SSE-capable client.
